definition: extra/surplus/remaining/remainder after division/(following numerical value) or more/in excess of (some number)/residue (math.)/after/I/me

sentences.english: Traditional Beijing roast duck is famous all over the world with a hundred years of history.
sentences.chinese: 老北京前门烤鸭名扬四海，至今已有百余年的历史。

sentences.english: He held the assignment for over ten years.
sentences.chinese: 他担任这一任务达10余年之久。

sentences.english: I remember that for one hundred years, they have set their armies to destroy us.
sentences.chinese: 我记得这百余年来它们不停地派军队来企图消灭我们。

sentences.english: He has cloistered himself in a monastery for more than thirty years.
sentences.chinese: 他隐居于修道院中已三十余年。

sentences.english: No. 4 semi-portal crane has been used in Qingtongxia Hydropower Station for more than 30 years.
sentences.chinese: 青铜峡水电厂4号半门式起重机投入运行已30余年。

sentences.english: Professor FENG Run-shen is engaged in medicine for more than 60 years.
sentences.chinese: 冯润身教授从医60余年，注重医德，医技精湛。

sentences.english: China's aircraft leasing business has an experience of more than 20 years, but still in its infancy.
sentences.chinese: 中国的飞机租赁业历经20余年，仍处于起步阶段。

sentences.english: For more than one decade I devoted myself to revolutionary struggle.
sentences.chinese: 我从事革命斗争，已经十余年了。

sentences.english: Graduated from Hubei Medical College and has engaged in clinic and science research over ten years.
sentences.chinese: 从事皮肤性病科科研临床十余年。

sentences.english: As early as two thousand years ago, China and Thailand started contact.
sentences.chinese: 早在两千余年前，中泰就开始了交往活动。

sentences.english: It took a hundred thousand men more than twenty years to build the Great Pyramid.
sentences.chinese: 大金字塔是由十多万人修造了二十余年才建成的。

sentences.english: Background Shexiang Baoxinwan has been used in treating coronary heart disease(CHD) for over thirty years.
sentences.chinese: 背景麝香保心丸自研发上市至今已达三十余年之久。

sentences.english: The history of Tan's Cuisine has exceeded a hundred years. It is an outstanding branch of Cantonese cuisine.
sentences.chinese: 谭家菜已有百余年历史，是粤式风味菜中的一朵奇葩。

sentences.english: Intramedullary fixation of rib fractures with generic Kirschner wires has been practiced for over 50 years.
sentences.chinese: 采用普通克氏针髓内固定肋骨骨折已有50余年。

sentences.english: Luancheng County history goes back to ancient times, there are more than 2,500 years.
sentences.chinese: 栾城县历史源远流长，有2500余年的历史。

sentences.english: The king, who has reigned for six decades, is widely revered.
sentences.chinese: 广受尊崇的普密蓬国王已经在位六十余年。

definition: in the years of/during those years/period (of dynasty or decade)
before the present/(a long period) ago
history/annals/title of an official historian in ancient China
(idiom) up to the present/even now/now (in contrast with the past)/at this late hour
deposits accumulated over long periods/fig. valuable experience, accumulated wisdom
